name: Faith's Sky High Escapdes
description:
What is FSHE?
Faith's Sky High Escapades is a Side scrolling, Bullet Hell and Shoot-em-up game where you take control of Faith. Faith is a Harpy who's trying to brave a storm, recollecting her mail she lost. Faith must avoid dangerous obstacles, and defeat enemies in her way using her feathers! 

There is a total of 16 levels, 8 Easy and 8 Hard Mode levels, challenging the player to reach the end, with more planned to release later! 

The Story?
On Faith's first day on being a mailwoman, Faith gets the job to deliver mail across the entire world, a task jokingly given out to her. Faith takes the job seriously, and before anyone could stop her, Faith took off as quick as possible to deliver all the mail. However, when flying too high, Faith got swept by intense winds, and ended up dropping her mailbag, and it swept them all around the sky. Panicked and worried about losing the mail, not being able to deliver them, Faith aims to recollect all her mail, and deliver all of them! Little does Faith know, that danger lurks at every corner...

The Future?
There are plans to have more days, levels, playable characters and even Minigames! 

So, if you'd like to see more, it'd mean a lot if you donated to my Ko-fi! 

Thank you for reading! Enjoy the game! 

And Thanks for Begwhi for making the awesome music!
Follow them here! https://twitter.com/Begwhi02
